question:
Which of the following dynasties were the part of the Vijayanagar Empire?
1) Sangama 
2) Saluva 
3) Aravidu 
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Harihara I and Bukka Raya I of the Sangama Dynasty established the Vijayanagar kingdom in 1336 CE in south India. It consisted of four dynasties — Sangama (c.1336–1485 CE), Saluva (c.1485–1503 CE), Tuluva (c.1503–1570 CE) and Aravidu (till the end of the 17th century).
